players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Charlie.
The villager Charlie was found dead.
Beware, Diana is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: "Alice is the mafioso. I investigated her last night. Please vote Alice; if I’m lying, you’ll see it after the arrest."
Bob: "Alice, claim your role now. Diana, share what you’ll do tonight if we spare you. Everyone: if Alice flips town, we vote Diana tomorrow."

You: "A detective claim on Day 1 after a single night and a dead villager is convenient. Diana, why didn’t you breadcrumb or wait? Bob, I’m a villager. If I flip town, promise we vote Diana tomorrow."

Diana: "Alice is confirmed mafia from my investigation. Bob, the optimal play: vote Alice now. If she flips town, you vote me tomorrow. If she’s mafia, town wins. There’s no world where sparing her helps us."
You: "A failed mafia kill N1 is impossible here; Charlie died. Diana claims a perfect red on me—too convenient. Bob, force specifics: Diana, who will you check tonight and why? Commit now."
Bob: "Alice, full claim with N1 actions. Diana, give your exact check method, when you decided, and who you’ll check N2 and why. Also, who would each of you vote if not each other? Commit now."

Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Alice, Diana voted for Alice
Alice was arrested
